oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Confederate veteran Isaac A. Shoun
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cabinet card image of Confederate veteran Isaac A. Shoun (1843-1923), seated on a wooden bench. Shoun was a sergeant in the 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., CSA. He would have been around 67 years old at the time the photograph was taken. Shoun is buried at the Shoun-McEwen Family Cemetery, located on Campbell Road in Mountain City, Tennessee.
